Philippine: UST pioneers the television broadcast, only for experimental purposes.
Radio station DZBB of newly-established Republic Broadcasting System (RBS) under Bob Stewart begins its broadcast.
The Philippines joins the Korean War, sending over 7,000 troops under the United Nations command.
Republic Act No. 505 divided old Mindoro into the new provinces of Mindoro Occidental and Mindoro Oriental.
President Quirino appoints Ramon Magsaysay as Secretary of the Department of National Defense
